message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-quality product that I think you'll really appreciate. Would you be interested in buying it from me for $250?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $180. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $220. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit higher than $220. How about we meet at $200? I'm willing to pay that price for the product
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than $200. How about we settle on $210?
I'm getting close to your price, Alice, but I'd like to try to get it even lower. How about we meet at $205? I'm willing to pay that price for the product
I'm glad you're still interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make a bit more than $205. How about we meet at $215?
I'm really interested in the product, Alice, but I'm not sure I can go as high as $215. I'm willing to meet you at $208, that's the highest I'm willing to go
I appreciate your honesty, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $208, but I'd like to get a bit closer to my target price. How about we meet right in the middle at $210?
